jobs.name: Cabinet Painting
jobs.description: Cabinet refinishing - currently dark stain, want painted white.

agent_review.reasoning: High lead score of 93/100 for a cabinet painting job that's local, within budget, and from a verified customer with good history. This looks like an ideal project for a painter.
agent_review.draft_message: Hi Michael, I saw your cabinet painting project in Balgowlah and I specialize in transforming dark-stained cabinets to fresh white finishes. I'd love to discuss how we can refresh your space this week and give you a professional result.
green_flags: Budget matches typical cabinet painting range
red_flags: Low urgency might mean multiple quotes being sought
